product_name: Canari Horizon Bike Shorts - Women's - 2011/2012 Closeout
long_description: Wear the women's Canari Horizon Bike Shorts for compression and comfort on long or short rides. Nylon/spandex fabric provides compression to combat muscle fatigue, dries quickly and offers UPF 30 sun protection. 6-panel anatomical design has chafe-free flatseam stitching. Arrivo seamless chamois is women-specific for maximum comfort. Canari Horizon Bike Shorts for women have soft-touch leg grippers and an 8 in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: Wear the women's Canari Horizon Bike Shorts for compression and comfort on long or short rides.
